医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
SwRI 开发了一种独特的技术来筛选新的 DNA 靶向疗法西南研究所 (SwRI) 开发了一种独特的技术来筛选新的 DNA 靶向疗法，旨在治疗癌症和其他疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/SwRI-develops-a-unique-technology-to-screen-new-DNA-targeting-therapeutics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/SwRI-develops-a-unique-technology-to-screen-new-DNA-targeting-therapeutics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=60467e0d-aaa5-4475-bb9a-28ad41c1e1a0 Mon, 19 Aug 2024 22:34:56 -0400 SwRI develops a unique technology to screen new DNA-targeting therapeutics
研究揭示了油酸在细菌性阴道病中恢复阴道微生物平衡的作用全球超过一半的女性患有细菌性阴道病 (BV) -；女性生殖道中自然存在的微生物不平衡 -；他们一生中至少有一次。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/Study-uncovers-oleic-acids-role-in-restoring-vaginal-microbial-balance-in-bacterial-vaginosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/Study-uncovers-oleic-acids-role-in-restoring-vaginal-microbial-balance-in-bacterial-vaginosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=371f862d-d9cc-4d12-9409-1a1956430da0 Mon, 19 Aug 2024 22:31:27 -0400 Study uncovers oleic acid's role in restoring vaginal microbial balance in bacterial vaginosis
肠道屏障在结直肠癌预后中发挥关键作用2024 年 8 月 14 日，Oncotarget 第 15 卷发表了一篇新综述，题为“肠道屏障作为结直肠癌治疗的看门人”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/The-gut-barrier-plays-key-role-in-colorectal-cancer-prognosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/The-gut-barrier-plays-key-role-in-colorectal-cancer-prognosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a870ccf-1b01-4498-9c0b-cec2d050a530 Mon, 19 Aug 2024 21:30:21 -0400 The gut barrier plays key role in colorectal cancer prognosis
磁性纳米粒子可能彻底改变听力损失药物输送正如企业需要有效且可靠的服务来将其产品交付给客户一样，药物也需要有效的交付系统来将其运送到可以产生影响的身体特定区域。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/Magnetic-nanoarticles-may-revolutionize-drug-delivery-for-hearing-loss.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/Magnetic-nanoarticles-may-revolutionize-drug-delivery-for-hearing-loss.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1275b944-c8f1-4729-acbb-bd26f283f59d Mon, 19 Aug 2024 15:20:18 -0400 Magnetic nanoparticles may revolutionize drug delivery for hearing loss
长期的新冠症状可能源于皮质醇水平低和大脑免疫反应改变科罗拉多大学博尔德分校科学家的最新动物研究表明，在初次感染后很长时间内，COVID-19留下的蛋白质会导致大脑中的皮质醇水平直线下降，使神经系统发炎，并使免疫细胞在另一个压力源出现时过度反应。 。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/Long-COVID-symptoms-may-stem-from-low-cortisol-and-altered-brain-immune-response.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/Long-COVID-symptoms-may-stem-from-low-cortisol-and-altered-brain-immune-response.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e50c930-1900-4da6-97f1-f6be2b88f1b0 Mon, 19 Aug 2024 15:16:45 -0400 Long COVID symptoms may stem from low cortisol and altered brain immune response
研究发现 Lecanemab 可有效靶向唐氏综合症患者的淀粉样斑块唐氏综合症患者很可能在年轻时患上阿尔茨海默病，尸检研究表明，到 40 岁时，唐氏综合症患者的大脑中就会出现淀粉样斑块。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/Lecanemab- effectively-targets-amyloid-plaques-in-people-with-Down-syndrome-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/Lecanemab- effectively-targets-amyloid-plaques-in-people-with-Down-syndrome-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bdef5cbd-251d-4b83-acf3-a7942531912a Mon, 19 Aug 2024 14:58:40 -0400 Lecanemab effectively targets amyloid plaques in people with Down syndrome, study finds
耗资 330 万美元的研究探索糖尿病前期和糖尿病患者的眼睛健康休斯敦大学视光学院耗资 330 万美元的研究将追踪糖尿病前期和糖尿病患者的健康状况，以找出哪些人可能出现眼部问题并面临未来视力丧失的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/2433-million-study-to-explore-eye-health-in-病人-with-prediabetes-and-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/2433-million-study-to-explore-eye-health-in-病人-with-prediabetes-and-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c6e0a197-4e5d-4612-8749-a2b5f7189327 Mon, 19 Aug 2024 14:51:28 -0400 $3.3 million study to explore eye health in patients with prediabetes and diabetes
AI模型可以根据有限的信息预测幼儿自闭症一种新的机器学习模型可以从相对有限的信息中预测幼儿的自闭症。卡罗林斯卡学院在 JAMA Network Open 上发表的一项新研究表明了这一点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/AI-model-can-predict-autism-in-young-children-from-limited-information.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/AI-model-can-predict-autism-in-young-children-from-limited-information.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a7944b1f-0aa7-49c9-9e90-464a00ec97c6 Mon, 19 Aug 2024 14:42:16 -0400 AI model can predict autism in young children from limited information
突破性研究揭示了基于逆转录元素的衰老生物标志物威尔康奈尔医学院和表观遗传学公司 TruDiagnostic 的研究人员在我们的基因中发现了与逆转录元素（古代病毒遗传物质的残留物）相关的 DNA 标记，这些标记充当预测实际年龄的高精度表观遗传时钟。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/Breakthrough-research-unveils-retroelement-based-aging-biomarkers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/Breakthrough-research-unveils-retroelement-based-aging-biomarkers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5c31aa32-64fd-44dd-9fe1-502df74e57ff Mon, 19 Aug 2024 14:37:08 -0400 Breakthrough research unveils retroelement-based aging biomarkers
新抗原疫苗的进步为个性化癌症治疗带来了希望癌症治疗的传奇以对这种具有复杂性和适应性的疾病的有效性的不懈追求为标志。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/Advancements-in-neoantigen-vaccines-offer-hope-for-personalized-cancer-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/Advancements-in-neoantigen-vaccines-offer-hope-for-personalized-cancer-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2dd269d-6f6f-4208-b05a-d07e4be6901e Mon, 19 Aug 2024 13:56:44 -0400 Advancements in neoantigen vaccines offer hope for personalized cancer therapy
